sentences.english: How can Hydropower Environmental Impact Assessments stop these occurrences.

sentences.english: Danba Hydropower Station is located in Ganzi Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture in Sichuan Province Danba County.

sentences.english: That includes electricity, water and 24-hour reception.

sentences.english: Ertan hydropower station is the first power station built on Yalong River.

sentences.english: At Futang hydropower station, the cylinder restricted surge tank is 31.

sentences.english: But it may eventually be supplied from hydropower dams on the nearby Namtha River.

sentences.english: Hongjia Ferry hydropower station is a tap station of wujiang River step exploitation in Guizhou province.

sentences.english: And rising bills are enough to make even the most bath-fond switch to showers.

sentences.english: A water power station must have a dam.
A hydroelectric dam should be built to provide electricity to the new provincial park.

sentences.english: Satisfactory results were achieved in practical application.

sentences.english: The downstream reach of Tankeng Hydropower Station is a key protection area of Pelochely bibroni.

sentences.english: This paper gives a comprehensive presentation of Yele Hydropower Station rock-fill dam design.

sentences.english: No. 4 semi-portal crane has been used in Qingtongxia Hydropower Station for more than 30 years.
